title: Madeline and the Easter bonnet. Madeline and the new house
brief_description: Two more wonderful adventures of little Madeline, narrated by Christopher Plummer and based on the classic books of Ludwig Bemelmans. “Madeline and the Easter bonnet”: Just in time for Easter, Madeline updates the old hat belonging to Bob Bon, the milk horse but then an enormous gust of wind sends the hat flying across town into the shop of a struggling designer, who attempts to market it in time for Easter. “Madeline and the new house”: When their home, the old house is condemned, Madeline and the girls are forced to move but where will they go?
